welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bussum, a charming city known for its picturesque streets, green spaces, and friendly atmosphere. We invite you to explore and soak up the local culture and charm during your stay. Enjoy your time in Bussum!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport handles all commercial flights and serves as the primary point of entry for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport is used for military operations and is not open to the public.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily serving budget airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily serving long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
